name: Backend CI

on:
  push:
    branches: [ main, develop ]
  pull_request:
    branches: [ main, develop ]

jobs:
  filter:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    outputs:
      common: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.common }}
      user_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.user_service }}
      auth_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.auth_service }}
      course_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.course_service }}
      content_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.content_service }}
      enrollment_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.enrollment_service }}
      assignment_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.assignment_service }}
      notification_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.notification_service }}
      payment_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.payment_service }}
      search_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.search_service }}
      analytics_service: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.analytics_service }}
      gateway: ${{ steps.filter.outputs.gateway }}
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4

      - name: Path Filter
        id: filter
        uses: dorny/paths-filter@v3
        with:
          filters: |
            common:
              - 'pom.xml'
              - 'lms-common/**'
            user_service:
              - 'services/lms-user-service/**'
            auth_service:
              - 'services/lms-auth-service/**'
            course_service:
              - 'services/lms-course-service/**'
            content_service:
              - 'services/lms-content-service/**'
            enrollment_service:
              - 'services/lms-enrollment-service/**'
            assignment_service:
              - 'services/lms-assignment-service/**'
            notification_service:
              - 'services/lms-notification-service/**'
            payment_service:
              - 'services/lms-payment-service/**'
            search_service:
              - 'services/lms-search-service/**'
            analytics_service:
              - 'services/lms-analytics-service/**'
            gateway:
              - 'lms-gateway/**'

  build-common:
    needs: filter
    if: needs.filter.outputs.common == 'true'
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
      - name: Set up JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        with:
          java-version: '17'
          distribution: 'temurin'
          cache: 'maven'
      - name: Build Common
        run: mvn clean install -pl lms-common -am

  build-services:
    needs: [filter, build-common]
    if: always() && !failure() && !cancelled()
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest
    strategy:
      fail-fast: false
      matrix:
        service:
          - { id: 'user_service', name: 'lms-user-service', path: 'services/lms-user-service' }
          - { id: 'auth_service', name: 'lms-auth-service', path: 'services/lms-auth-service' }
          - { id: 'course_service', name: 'lms-course-service', path: 'services/lms-course-service' }
          - { id: 'content_service', name: 'lms-content-service', path: 'services/lms-content-service' }
          - { id: 'enrollment_service', name: 'lms-enrollment-service', path: 'services/lms-enrollment-service' }
          - { id: 'assignment_service', name: 'lms-assignment-service', path: 'services/lms-assignment-service' }
          - { id: 'notification_service', name: 'lms-notification-service', path: 'services/lms-notification-service' }
          - { id: 'payment_service', name: 'lms-payment-service', path: 'services/lms-payment-service' }
          - { id: 'search_service', name: 'lms-search-service', path: 'services/lms-search-service' }
          - { id: 'analytics_service', name: 'lms-analytics-service', path: 'services/lms-analytics-service' }
          - { id: 'gateway', name: 'lms-gateway', path: 'lms-gateway' }
    steps:
      - name: Checkout code
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        if: needs.filter.outputs[matrix.service.id] == 'true' || needs.filter.outputs.common == 'true'

      - name: Set up JDK 17
        uses: actions/setup-java@v4
        if: needs.filter.outputs[matrix.service.id] == 'true' || needs.filter.outputs.common == 'true'
        with:
          java-version: '17'
          distribution: 'temurin'
          cache: 'maven'

      - name: Install Common (if not built in previous job)
        if: (needs.filter.outputs[matrix.service.id] == 'true' || needs.filter.outputs.common == 'true') && needs.filter.outputs.common != 'true'
        run: mvn install -pl lms-common -DskipTests

      - name: Build Service
        if: needs.filter.outputs[matrix.service.id] == 'true' || needs.filter.outputs.common == 'true'
        run: mvn clean install -pl ${{ matrix.service.name }} -am
